channel.title: Blog of Paul Batchelor
channel.description: This is a blog. Music, Computers, etc.

item.title: Weekly Update 5: Sculpting a Digital Vocal Tract
item.description: This week, I found myself manually "sculpting" a digital vocal tract using my monome grid and a very large knob. I also made some bitmap doodles.

item.title: Weekly Update 4: A Text Editor for the Monome Grid
item.description: This week, I found myself building a hyper-minimal "text editor" for the monome grid. I attempt to explain myself.

item.title: Weekly Updates 3: Synthesizing the Voice of a Tiny Creature
item.description: This week, I found myself synthesizing the voice of a Tiny Creature. I did this while attempting to figure out more about the DSP behind Adult Swim's "Choir" Interactive Barbershop Quartet. I also reflect back on some of my previous attempts at synthesizing singing vocal ensembles.

item.title: Weekly Updates 2
item.description: This week, I found myself reading about the aesthetics of permacomputing, fiddling with bits of fasttracker 2 engine code, and experimenting with small ortholinear grid interfaces.

item.title: Weekly Updates 1
item.description: This week, I found myself implementing Glottal pulsed noise (a thing used in my singing synthesizer), completing my proto-gestling (proof of concept for my [Gestlings](/wiki/gestlings) project), and thinking about a concept in game development that I'm calling "asset-driven development".

item.title: Weekly Updates?
item.description: This week, I find myself wanting to blog again...
